meanings.definition: A complete or impressive collection of things
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a panoply of ancient artifacts.
meanings.sent2: The panoply of colors in the sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: At the party, there was a panoply of snacks to choose from.
meanings.sent4: The forest revealed a panoply of wildlife as the sun rose.
meanings.sent5: Her wardrobe held a panoply of dresses for every occasion.

meanings.definition: A wide-ranging and impressive array or display
meanings.sent1: The concert featured a panoply of musical genres.
meanings.sent2: The city skyline was a panoply of lights during the festival.
meanings.sent3: The chef presented a panoply of desserts for the food critics.
meanings.sent4: The garden boasted a panoply of flowers in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The art gallery showcased a panoply of paintings by local artists.
